articles.title: From Svedka to Anthropic, brands make bold plays with AI in Super Bowl ads - TechCrunch
articles.description: From the first AI-generated Big Game ad courtesy of Svedka to Anthropic's beef with OpenAI, here are the biggest ads from Super Bowl LX.
articles.content: Following last year’s trend of showcasing AI in multimillion-dollar ad spots, the 2026 Super Bowl advertisements took it a step further by leveraging AI both to create the commercials and to promote … [+6179 chars]

articles.author: Jordan Hart
articles.title: The '996' work culture taking over Silicon Valley is coming at a 'human expense,' these AI researchers say - Business Insider
articles.description: Two AI researchers said the 996 work culture, which is gaining traction in Silicon Valley, can lead to burnout for tech workers.
articles.content:
The AI wars are driving a more demanding work culture in Silicon Valley that some insiders worry is burning workers out.
A "996
" work schedule, in which employees work six days a week from 9 a.m. … [+2142 chars]
